CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 5, 1961, pg. 12 reads: "Spark GPIL Benefit - Adding color to the Frappe Sip sponsored by the Original D. I. Club to benefit the GPIL were, left to right: Front row: Juanita Drake, a D.I.; Phyl Garland, master of ceremonies; Gloria Grate, a D.I.; the Rev. LeRoy Patrick, and Margaret West Watson, president of the group. Back row: Nellye Baron, a D.I.; Arthur C. Holloway, president of the GPIL, and Councilman James A. Jordon, main speaker. - Harris Photo."image of Nellye Baron not in negative, pasted in image published by Pittsburgh Courier.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, front row from left: Juanita Drake, Phyl Garland, Gloria Golden Grate, Rev. LeRoy Patrick, and Margaret West Watson; back row: Arthur C. Holloway, and Councilman James A. Jordon, posed in front of home of Nellie Baron for D. I. Club and Greater Pittsburgh Improvement League (GPIL) Frappe Sip, Grotto Street
